column2: "This is a Partner Card, isn't it? If you have this, you can call us to fight with you! Ehehe, take good care of it!"
"I'll give you mine as well. Heh, I can finally fight side by side with you."
"Oh, don't worry, we're using our living bodies right now, but we'll switch to our Darknix bodies before we go into battle."
"Our new Darknix bodies can operate in high-Photon environments! That's why we can fight with you now!"

"Hehe, you can count on us!
...Hey, Leader, can I ask for your help with something?"
